name: Web Pirates Love Daisies
description: Pirates Love Daisies is a TD game. Player can unite a group of pirates to defend sea creatures to loot the daisies. By setting different pirate members on the map to earn gold and points, each pirate member will do their best to destroy the invading creatures to protect daisies.

en_US.description: Pirates Love Daisies is a TD game. Player can unite a group of pirates to defend sea creatures to loot the daisies. By setting different pirate members on the map to earn gold and points, each pirate member will do their best to destroy the invading creatures to protect daisies.
en_US.name: Web Pirates Love Daisies

zh_CN.description: Pirates Love Daisies是一款塔防类游戏，玩家可以建立海盗团去防御海中生物对雏菊的抢夺，只要布置海盗团成员在不同的地图位置上，通过赚取金币和积累积分，每个海盗成员就会拿出看家本领来去消灭前来冒犯的生物，捍卫雏菊。
zh_CN.name: Pirates Love Daisies网页版
